alldb.table_sql: select decode(cii.INVOICE_TYPE,'invoicetype1','增值税专用发票','invoicetype2','增值税普通发票' ) taxlevel, tax.out_no outon, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') outdate, dealer.cust_name dealername, cust.cust_name custname, cii.taxNumber taxregcode, cii.INVOICE_ADDRESS||' '||cii.invoice_tel taxregadd, cii.INVOICE_OPENBANK ||' '||cii.INVOICENUMBER as tax_bankandacc, '' as memo, '' as notenum, '' as commoncode, '' as commonnum, '{currentLoginRealName}' as exportperson, '' as reviewperson, '' as payee, '' as cancelbank, '' as canceladdr, '' as goodsnum, dict.name_ feetype, cffp.plan_date||dict.name_ as modelname, '' as unit, '' as amount, cffp.plan_money, '0.17' as taxrate, round((cffp.plan_money/1.17)*0.17,2) as taxmoney, '' c1, '' c2, '' c3 from contract_fund_fund_plan cffp left join contract_invoice_info cii on cii.contract_id = cffp.contract_id left join contract_info ci on cffp.contract_id = ci.id left join cust_info dealer on dealer.id=ci.cust_dealer left join t_dicts_datas dict on cffp.fee_type = dict.code_ left join (select cust_info.id,cust_info.cust_name,tax_level,TAX_REG_CODE,tax_bank,tax_acc,tax_phone,tax_reg_add from cust_info left join (select cust_id,tax_level,tax_reg_code,tax_bank,tax_acc,tax_phone,tax_reg_add from cust_info_company union select cust_id,tax_level,TAX_REG_CODE,tax_bank,tax_acc,tax_phone,tax_reg_add from cust_info_person) info on cust_info.id = info.cust_id) cust on ci.cust_id = cust.id left join tax_fund_info tax on cffp.id=tax.cffp_id where cffp.invalid='0' and ci.contract_status >= 21 and ci.contract_status <= 31 and dict.code_ in ('feetype1', 'feetype4', 'feetype5') and tax.id is not null and tax.id in ({ids})
